actions.name: Weapon Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} slashing damage.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC {dc} Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Heavy Smash
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Ground Slam
actions.text: Each creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a DC {dc} Strength saving throw or take {damage} bludgeoning damage and be pushed 5 ft.

actions.name: Dagger Strike
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} piercing damage.

actions.name: Quick Shot
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} piercing damage.

actions.name: Mace Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Burst
actions.text: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC {dc} Wisdom saving throw or take {damage} radiant damage.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack: {toHit} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} force damage.

actions.name: Mind Lance
actions.text: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a DC {dc} Intelligence saving throw or take {damage} psychic damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: {toHit} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: {damage} bludgeoning damage.
